title: Integrative Medicine
description: Our Integrative Medicine team cares for the whole person using therapeutic and evidence-based practices.
cleaned_text: Our Integrative Medicine team cares for the whole person using therapeutic and evidence-based practices so people can live a long, healthy and happy life. Our experts are ready to partner with you in the healing process to influence health, wellness and disease. We are committed to giving you both conventional and complimentary methods to provide you the best outcome possible. We will work with you to create a treatment plan that is tailored to your unique goals. Our providers promote both health and the prevention of illness by focusing on five key areas: - Sleeping well - Moving well - Eating well - Avoiding toxins - Having a purpose We provide you comprehensive integrative medicine care. Our team works collaboratively with each other to facilitate your innate healing response. We use a vast network of experts to provide natural and less invasive techniques to help you get back to health. It starts with primary care To gain access to Integrative Medicine services, it is important to work with your primary care provider to coordinate your care. We treat people like people It's not just a doctor-patient relationship. It's person to person. Integrative medicine doesn't start with essential oils. It starts with a hello, and it continues with asking, "How are things today?" We provide care close to home We have providers who offer integrative medicine care throughout the heart of Wisconsin where we're able to provide a quality of care that rivals anywhere in the country. Health begins with your community Our Center for Community Health Advancement enriches lives by addressing health priorities in our communities.
